ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] My day in Kaesora was  Re: MM Drum misadventure and Nostrolo Tamborine
ygData.msgSnippet: Just shows you  Random  the spawns are.  Xalbox was the guy my group was camping.  He/PH spawns every forty minutes.  They got whole mess of
ygData.messageBody:
Just shows you <Sarcasm> Random </Sarcasm> the spawns are. Xalbox was the
guy my group was camping. He/PH spawns every forty minutes. They got whole
mess of them. I think five or six. I missed several caused I died do to
the whole area spawning/agroing and getting killed seconds before the Evac
went off.

The prob with Kaesora (and perhaps one of the reason for it being under
used) it's a LONG run for a corpse retrieval...

Slyde "having trouble getting that Last bub of 43" Katzenjammer
Xegony Server

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4
[mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Monday, June 12, 2000 2:46 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] My day in Kaesora was Re: MM Drum misadventure
and Nostrolo Tamborine


<snip>
moved back up to the library to harvesy coins. All told we were in Kaesora
for about six hours. Unfortunately Xalboz never spawned. However, the
fallen crypt raider spawned a total of five times. So every bard who
attended the raid got a coin. People who had been in Kaesora before were
<snip>
